testcase.name: go to about us
testcase.system-out: Given browser is open and go to stockbit....................................passed And i see About Us in main page.............................................passed When I tap About Us.........................................................passed Then I will direct to About Us page.........................................passed And i can see informasi perusahaan..........................................passed

testcase.name: login with valid credential
testcase.system-out: Given browser is open and go to stockbit website............................passed And i see login button......................................................passed When I click login button in homepage.......................................passed And i can see username and password field...................................passed And i input "hardi.uus.droid@gmail.com" and "Stockbit123" correctly.........passed And i click login button....................................................passed Then I will direct to dashboard page........................................passed
